name: The Witch's Sexual Prison
description:
“Indecent male dog should speak honestly~” the beautiful master trampled me on the ground and looked down at me.◆Featured Systems ◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system◆StoryMaster said that I’m full of sexual desire
If I want to cure my perverted behavior, I should wear the chastity sheath
“Even the chastity sheath can’t cure you… seems that you need to be trained hard."
I had always been a very horny guy. I would think about H things all day that my master called me a male dog on heat…
But then I suddenly wanted to cure my perverted behavior
Could I succeed?
However, along with the training progress, I felt like I became more horny
Was that normal? Was she… really my master?◆How to PlayThe main gameplay is to live with your beautiful “master”. Along with the storyline development, the “master” would train you with various S&M methods.
Your choices will bring you to different endings.
This game has many unique H events.
Along with the game progress, you may unlock various H positions.
There are even fantastic potion training and magical transformation.

But in your sweet sexual life, you slightly felt indisposed.
If you insisted on leaving, you would face the irreversible physical training.
Would you choose your downfall or try to escape that small house?◆Game Characteristic◇16 Basic CG, Including More Than 200 Different Pictures
◇Game Text: 50.000 words
◇Training M Game
◇Game Ending：5 Types
